title: The Adventures of Otto
description: The adventures of Otto, the vest-wearing turtle. A school-appropriate film that’s both entertaining and harmless.
quote: I haven’t seen a man who looks like that, but if he stole a book from the libaray, I’m down to help you find him.
altHero: Otto the turtle in a vest on a plaid blanket in a canoe
alt1: a gardening woman speaks with Otto the turtle by a garden shed
alt2: the gardening woman in a straw hat
alt3: Otto the turtle sitting on a phone book in a car
alt4: a vintage blue car drives down a rural road
